channel.title: Npc shop help
channel.description:
okay. just say i want peska ===id 538 to sell, lets see dragon armor. i know to go to shops.cfg and add items and numbers so wat appears in his shop. but where do i go to program it so the items go to HIS shop. i tried something like this.
} else if (NPCID == 538) { //Pk4r Pk4r PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Pk4r Pk4r
in client.java is there ANYTHING else i have to do for the npc to get the shop item i programmed in shops.cfg i also THINK that wannashop = 1; means first shop in order asin shop 1. the solution is probably rlly simple im just not seeing it. its been about a year since ive coded and i only played for about two months at that time anywayz.

item.title: Npc shop help
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

thats wat i hav i hav the npc listed as. wannashop = 1. asin shop 1 then as shop 1 i hav a bones shop. at my training place. and i added the items. i dont get any errors or nuttin just nothing appears in the shop. then when i take rickscapes shops.cfg the items for peska id=538 appear in the shop :S

Read full topic

item.title: Npc shop help
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

Also look into your shops.cfg if shop 1 exists , if it does , you edit the item ID’s , if it doesnt you make a new one , it would be like >>
1 DragonShop 2 2 3140 100 4087 100 1187 100 4585 100 << something like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc shop help
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

i just put 1 item to see if it would appear. and it didnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc shop help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

wanneShop = 1 is shop 1.
Edit shop 1 with different items and amounts.

Read full topic

okay. just say i want peska ===id 538 to sell, lets see dragon armor. i know to go to shops.cfg and add items and numbers so wat appears in his shop. but where do i go to program it so the items go to HIS shop. i tried something like this.

} else if (NPCID == 538) { //Pk4r Pk4r PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Pk4r Pk4r

in client.java
